About us For any occasion 40,000 Square feet of ballroom, conference rooms, hospitality suites and more Charleston Praise From the folks we worked directly with to everyone we interacted with it was a TOP notch experience. Raynor Garage Doors Our meeting grew from 400 to 800 because of the draw of The Charleston Place. South Carolina School Boards Association I have been in the Continuing Education business for 25 years and have worked with many hotels. I have never had a better experience. American Motility Society Personable, not stuffy, five-diamond service. It’s a meeting planner’s dream since they are on top of everything. They are proactive and one step ahead of most other hotels. COBANK I have nothing but the best things to say about our experience. The customer service, food, and facilities were fantastic and our guests were extremely pleased with the accommodations. HUDSON AUTOMOTIVE I’ve been to many hotels, but never have I continued to reflect back on the professionalism and charm of the staff. FEDEX I literally haven’t ever been to a hotel where the fabric of the place just sang because of the people who just so obviously loved their own hotel and were so proud to work there. Indulge Charleston continues to wow visitors from around the world with its mix of natural beauty, storied history, and vibrant culture. Here, you’ll immerse yourself in it all. From rejuvenating spa services to historic adventures and culinary explorations, you’ll find something amazing for every taste, mood, and occasion. Made with joy in mind Exclusive Offers and Delights Arrive in Style Enjoy 10% off your stay, complimentary valet parking, and two nights of elevated comfort and convenience. With curated amenities and a seamless arrival, this offer makes it easy to experience Charleston in effortless style. Details Luxury accommodations Seamless arrival with complimentary valet parking Nightly turndown service In-room welcome amentity Valid for stays now through March 31. Two-night minimum required. Blackout dates apply, including . Offer is subject to availability and may include additional restrictions. Disclaimer: February 13-14, March 13-14, and March 27-28 Book Now Enhance Your Stay with Club Level Access Elevate your stay with exclusive access to our Club Lounge, now relocated to a refreshed floor plan for a limited time. Enjoy personalized service, dedicated staff, and complimentary culinary offerings, from breakfast to after-dinner indulgences, in a reimagined atmosphere of luxury. Details Luxury accommodations Club Lounge access Reserve Stay A Little Longer Why stay two nights when you can enjoy greater savings and even more time to explore Charleston by staying three consecutive nights? Extend your getaway and savor every moment of luxury, charm, and unforgettable experiences. Details Luxury accommodations Up to 15% off a three-night stay Reserve Breakfast in Charleston After a glorious night’s sleep, awaken to a delicious breakfast in bed or at The Palmetto Cafe, where fresh, locally inspired dishes start your day on a delightful note. Details Luxury accommodations Daily breakfast at The Palmetto Cafe Subject to availability. Restrictions may apply. Not combinable with any other packages or offers. Valid for new bookings only. Disclaimer: Reserve The Cooper I Experience Experience Charleston from the water with a private charter aboard our custom Hinckley yacht. Available only to guests of The Charleston Place, this experience offers a serene and sophisticated way to explore the city’s historic harbor, all from the comfort of a beautifully appointed vessel, Cooper I. Whether you’re celebrating something special or simply chasing the horizon, this package invites you to slow down, take in the sea breeze, and see the Holy City from a fresh perspective. Details Luxury accommodations two-hour A private, captain-led charter aboard The Cooper I , our custom Hinckley yacht Flexible sail time, arranged seamlessly through our Concierge team A bespoke welcome amenity awaits as you step aboard the Hinckley Disclaimer: Subject to availability. Restrictions may apply. Not combinable with any other packages or offers. Valid for new bookings only. Reserve The Suite Life Lounge in a luxurious and spacious suite and embrace the charm of our cosmopolitan hideaway as you savor breakfast in bed or in our garden cafe. Details Package includes: Daily breakfast at The Palmetto Cafe or in-room dining ($30 credit per person, per day) Daily valet parking for one vehicle : Two-night minimum stay required. Restrictions may apply. Subject to availability. Disclaimer Reserve Furry Friend in Residence All are welcome at The Charleston Place, including your furry companion. Let us make your pet feel like a VI-Pet in Residence with a selection of items to enhance your stay. Details Use of the following during your stay – food and water bowls for use during your stay Pet Custom Foggy Dog bed and bandanna for use during stay and to be taken home as a souvenir pet Not required for a stay. Subject to availability. Restrictions may apply. 7-day advance notice is required. Based on availability. Must be booked separately through the Concierge. Welcoming hotel guests, visitors, and locals alike, our spa features six elegant treatment rooms, including two couples’ suites, a tranquil relaxation lounge, a full-service nail salon, and a thoughtfully curated boutique. Hours Monday – Thursday 8AM – 2:30PM Friday 8AM – 6:30PM Saturday – Sunday 8AM – 8:30PM For more information, call 843-937-8522 The Spa at The Charleston Place will close for its reimagination starting . From , spa hours will be adjusted, with final appointments concluding at daily. February 15 February 1–15 2:00 PM View Offerings Relax & Rejuvenate Featured Treatments Previous Slide Next Slide Glow Facial Available in 50 or 100-minute treatments, this gentle yet highly effective facial is inspired by Irene Forte’s Sicilian heritage and Farm-to-Lab philosophy. Mediterranean botanicals, organic ingredients, and a sculpting facial massage work together to deeply nourish the skin, leaving it radiant, restored, and luminous. Book Now Previous Slide Next Slide Essentials Manicure & Pedicure A classic approach to nail care designed to refresh from fingertips to toes. Nails and cuticles are expertly shaped and groomed, followed by soothing botanicals and aromatherapy bath salts to soften and restore. A hydrating shea butter massage revives hands and feet, finishing with your choice of nail color. Book Now Previous Slide Next Slide Sicilian Serenity Massage Melt into deep relaxation with this custom full-body massage featuring Irene Forte’s organic Sicilian body oils. Enhanced with the soothing warmth of hot stones and a rose quartz facial massage, this restorative experience calms the body, centers the mind, and leaves the skin nourished and radiant. Available in 50- or 100-minute sessions. Book Now Experience Wellness Explore Offerings Your individualized journey of self-reflection, wellness, and well-being starts now. Enveloped in a serene atmosphere, our tranquil spa awaits. Utilizing organic, natural, and science-backed products, our holistic therapeutic practices are designed to meet you where you are. Unleash your strength and vitality with our dedicated stretching area and diverse cardio selections, tailored for your holistic well-being. The fitness center is now located on the 2nd floor to the right of the elevators during the of 4th floor facilities.
